attributes.action: Counter-protest against remain. Honour the referendum! Leave the EU on Oct 31st
attributes.additional_details: Sign this petition to show your support for Leaving the EU on October 31st 2019 and show your support for the proroguing of parliament to get this done NOW. Let's have our own petition! Let's get the 17.4million people who voted, on here who can show their support and give the government AND remainers the PROOF that we all STILL want to leave the shackles of the EU.
attributes.background: A petition was recently created to stop the government proroguing parliament. This is wholly undemocratic. Too often the Leave side get no say, no petition, nothing. We are too busy living our lives preparing for Brexit.
